title: Task-Based Collaborative Engineering Education Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Innovative engineering education design competency enhancement for pre-service/in-service teachers using the ADDIE-Twist model.

learning_goals: Learners can design engineering education courses applying the dual-helix structure (instructional tasks/learning tasks) of the ADDIE-Twist model.
Learners can devise a project-based assessment system utilizing intelligent educational tools and lightweight collaboration platforms in a task-based collaborative learning environment.
Learners can develop and implement a flexible engineering education program reflecting a learner-centered feedback mechanism.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
